{{infobox character | people=[[Edain|Adan]] | name=Imlach | image=Juliana Pinho - Sons of Marach.png | caption="Sons of Marach" by [[:Category:Images by Juliana Pinho|Juliana Pinho]] | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location= | affiliation= | language=[[Mannish]] dialect | birth={{FA|310}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Hador|House of Marach]] | parentage=[[Marach]] | siblings=[[Malach]] | spouse= | children=[[Amlach]] | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Imlach''' (born {{FA|310}}) was a son of [[Marach]], founder of the [[House of Hador|House of Marach]], and the younger brother of [[Malach|Malach Aradan]].{{WJ|West}}, ''Commentary, (ii) The House of Hador'' History records almost nothing about his life, except that his son [[Amlach]] was among the leaders of dissent at [[Estolad]].{{S|West}} == Genealogy == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree| | | | | | | | | | | MAR | | |MAR=[[Marach]]

''b. {{FA|365|n}}''}} {{familytree/end}} ==Other versions of the legendarium== In an earlier version of the 'Folk of Marach' family tree, Imlach's name was given as ''Imrach''. {{References}} [[Category:Characters in The Silmarillion]] [[Category:Edain]] [[Category:First Age characters]] [[Category:House of Hador]] [[de:Imlach]] [[fi:Imlach]] [[fr:encyclo/personnages/hommes/1a/peuple de hador/imlach]]
